articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Controversy Surrounds Abrego Garcia’s Return to U.S.
articles.description: Kilmar Abrego Garcia, deported from Maryland under Trump's administration, has returned to the U.S. to face charges of transporting illegal immigrants. His case highlights tensions over aggressive immigration policies. Abrego Garcia's lawyers dispute the charges, citing potential corruption in sourcing testimonies.
articles.content: Kilmar Abrego Garcia, previously deported to El Salvador, was flown back to the United States amid criminal charges related to transporting illegal immigrants within the country, according to Attorney General Pam Bondi. The Trump administration's han... [888 chars]

articles.author: The Guardian
articles.title: Trump news at a glance: Elon Musk rift deepens as president says ‘poor guy’s got a problem’
articles.description: No peace in sight for Trump and former confidant as president also tells reporters ‘I’m not even thinking about Elon’ – key US politics stories from Friday 6 June at a glance
articles.content:
Donald Trump appeared in no mood to patch things up with former top adviser Elon Musk on Friday, doubling down on his new hostility towards the Tesla and Space X tycoon with a number of disparaging statements.

articles.author: Vancouver Is Awesome
articles.title: B.C. targets U.S. doctors and nurses with recruitment ads near American hospitals
articles.description: British Columbia has launched a six-week, $5-million campaign of targeted advertisements to recruit doctors and nurses in the United States, citing "chaos" under the Trump administration to lure them north.
articles.content:

articles.title: Modi remains silent on Trump ceasefire claim: Rahul Gandhi in Bihar
articles.description: This was Gandhi’s fifth visit to Bihar in the last five months.

articles.title: Trump fast-tracks supersonic travel, amid spate of flight-related executive orders
articles.description: President Donald Trump signed an executive order directing the Federal Aviation Administration to lift the 52-year ban on supersonic flight over U.S. soil.
articles.content:
In Brief

articles.author: CBS News
articles.title: Appeals court allows Trump to ban AP from smaller spaces for now
articles.description: A federal appeals court is allowing the Trump White House to ban the Associated Press from the Oval Office and other restricted spaces for now.
articles.content:
A federal appeals court is allowing the Trump White House to ban the Associated Press from the Oval Office and other restricted spaces for now in a ruling that blocked a lower court's ruling that claimed the ban was unconstitutional.

articles.title: 'Hope he does well,' Trump says no plans to speak to Musk as feud over tax-cut bill persists
articles.description: The Tesla chief did not directly address Trump but kept up his criticism of the massive Republican tax and spending bill that contains much of Trump's domestic agenda.
articles.content:
“I hope he does well with Tesla,” Trump said.
Addressing reporters aboard Air Force One, Trump said he wasn’t “thinking about” the Tesla CEO.

articles.title: Donald Trump and Elon Musk urged by Republicans to end feud
articles.description: Mr Trump said the world’s richest man had ‘lost his mind’ in a television interview on Friday.
articles.content:
